prompt.name: Explore the 'Others' Section and find Job Opportunities
prompt.instruction: go to https://cse.buet.ac.bd/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User explores the 'Others' section and navigates to the job opportunities page.

input.action: 'Click on Others', 'Click on Jobs@CSE', 'Click on Part time teacher recruitment'

expected.outcome: The user successfully finds job opportunities at CSE, BUET.

prompt.name: Explore Postgraduate Programs and find Admission Notice
prompt.instruction: go to https://cse.buet.ac.bd/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User explores the postgraduate programs and finds the latest admission notice.

input.action: 'Click on Academics', 'Click on Graduate Studies', 'Click on courses', 'Click on `DevOps Engineering` course','Click on the 'Admission' tab', 'Click on 'PG Admission October 2024''

expected.outcome: The user successfully explores a postgraduate program and and lands on page with PG Admission April 2024 notice.

prompt.name: Find Information about a Specific Research Group
prompt.instruction: go to https://cse.buet.ac.bd/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the research section and finds information about a specific research group.

input.action: 'Click on Research', 'Click on Research Area', 'Go to specific research area, for example, 'Algorithms and theory'', 'Click on Dr Md Saidur Rahman','Click on Research','Click on `Graph Drawing Research Group`'

expected.outcome: The user successfully lands on the page of the `Graph Drawing Research Group`.

prompt.name: Check for Recent News and Events
prompt.instruction: go to https://cse.buet.ac.bd/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User checks for the latest news and events and navigates to a specific news article.

input.action: 'Scroll down to Latest News', 'Click on Visit News Blog', 'Click on the first news article', 'Read the article', 'Go back to the News Blog', 'Click on Incubator', 'Download Startup Incubator Policy'

expected.outcome: The user successfully checks for recent news and events.

prompt.name: Find Courses for Undergraduate Studies

expected.outcome: The user successfully finds courses for undergraduate studies.

prompt.name: Navigate to Contact Page

prompt.description: User navigates to the Contact page.

input.action: 'Click on `Contact` on the footer','Click Visiting CSE','Enter name as `Test User`, 'Enter email as `test@gmail.com', 'Choose alumni as connection to cse','Enter brac as workplace', 'Click on Calendar icon of Start Date and Choose 29 June,2025', 'Click on Calendar icon of End Date and Choose 01 August,2025','Click on Clock icon of Start Time and Choose 10:20 AM', 'Click on Clock icon of End Time and Choose 04:20 PM'

expected.outcome: The form is filled out successfully.

prompt.name: Find information about the NSysS 2024 conference

expected.outcome: The user successfully finds information about the NSysS 2024 conference.

prompt.name: Explore the history of the CSE department
prompt.instruction: go to https://cse.buet.ac.bd/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'About Us' section and explores the history of the department.

input.action: 'Go to `About Us` in footer', 'Click on History', 'Click on `Vision and Mission` in footer', 'Click on Search icon on top of the page','Select `Publication` radio button','Type secret in the search bar'

expected.outcome: The user successfully sees the list of publications related to the keyword `secret`.
